title: I Think i Found A Chroma Bug
body: chromas for Warlord Shen are visible to buy in loading screen but not able to be purchased in the store. (link is visual proof)

replies.body: Per the [patch notes, ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-79-notes)there are some skins aimed to be released during the patch but that doesn't necessarily mean on the same day.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for not to see when it will become unlockable.  Let me know if that clears things up!
thank you, am a shen main and just got so excited for the new skin, I understand completely
